description:
Simple, robust and reliable, we should all be so well bestowed. The one-piece fixed length shaft is the lightest in the G3 quiver, and though not duded-up or fancy, it consistently gets the job done.

  • Removable strap is shaped for comfort, with a simple buckle for adjustment or removal for backcountry or tree skiing
  • Ergonomically shaped dual-density plastic grip has ridges to help maintain grip
  • Secondary grip position allows you to move your hand down when side-hilling
  • Quickflick utility tab on handle works great to flick your bindings into ski or hike mode
  • 85mm All-Mountain baskets can also be used to flip up your binding heel lifts
  • Carbide tips grip well on ice and rock
name: G3 Fixie Ski Poles
